Name: Destructivator 2
About the game: Take on the role of a tiny little super soldier decked out in lime green and blast and insta-melee your way to victory! Unapologetically old school, forget the last 30 years ever happened and take on vast armies of soldiers, robots, spaceships, cruel traps, mini bosses & bosses - on foot and in vehicles. With sharp colourful graphics, catchy tunes & 54 levels, there's a lot of fun to be had here! 54 Levels Vast array of enemies - soldiers, sentries, turrets, tanks, space ships, spiders, centipedes.... Bosses & frequent mini boss fights Wear a hideous lime green suit Commandeer enemy ships and attack from the air Easy, Normal and Brutal skill levels to suit everybody Small characters in a big screens for that classic 80s feel In game text languages: English Cymraeg
